sentences.sentence: Most often we procrastinate when faced with something we do not want to do.
sentences.translation: 面对不想做的事情，我们经常拖延。

sentences.sentence: We all procrastinate sometimes, especially when it comes to things we aren't really fond of.
sentences.translation: 我们都有拖延的时候，尤其是遇到不喜欢的事情的时候。

sentences.sentence: "Some people procrastinate cleaning. Some people procrastinate by cleaning," says Professor Peter Stone.
sentences.translation: “有些人会拖延打扫卫生。有些人通过打扫卫生来拖延。”彼得·斯通教授表示。
